subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Brendan Steele did just enough to keep the lead at the Frys.com Open in Napa, Calif., shooting a three-under-par 69 for a one-shot lead over Andrew Loupe and Kevin Na.
snippet: Brendan Steele did just enough to keep the lead at the Frys.com Open in Napa, Calif., shooting a three-under-par 69 for a one-shot lead over Andrew Loupe and Kevin Na.
